verses.text: Jab'xonhej val syal vik'an vik' svab'i. Vanxo sk'och in q'uinal t'a slajvub', wach'xo yaj ved'tal t'a campusante.
Ha eb' anima, oyanoch eb' in sb'uchani, masanil tiempo syak' kus in k'ol eb', maxtzac yal in colan in b'ha t'a eb'.
Palta Mamin colin, yujto malaj junocxo mach syak'och sb'a in scolani, a achnhej syal uuj.
Ha ach ix a k'ub'ejel jelanil t'a juntzanh eb' winh vamigo tik, manh in a cha ak'joc ganar yuj eb' winh.
Elocab'k'och icha syal jun ab'ix: Ha junok mach syixtej junok yamigo, haxo yuninal ol ab'an syail yuj jun tas sk'ulej chi'.
Ha ach ix ak' yal chuk eb' anima t'ayin, ix laj stzub'an in sat eb'.
Toxonhej k'ik'aminac vilan yuj in yaelal. Ichato manh chequeloc in nivanil tik, yujto ix in te b'acb'i.
Ayic syilan eb' anima wach' sb'eyb'al tas tzin ik'an tik, sat sk'ol eb', scot yoval eb', yujto chuk in snaan eb'.
Ha eb' wach' sb'eyb'al, wach'nhej ol elk'och eb'. Ha eb' malaj chukal sk'ulej, ol q'uenhejchaanh eb'.
Palta cotanhec t'a tik ex vamigo. Malaj junok aj pensar tz'ilchaj vuj t'a e cal.
B'elb'on yek' in q'uinal, haxo tas nab'il vuuj, ma tas tzin nib'ej, toxo ix juvieli.
Ha ex tik a t'ak'walil tzeyaloch k'ualil, haxo yic k'ik'q'uinal, tzeyalani, lak'anxo ay sakil k'inal.
Toxonhej tzin tanhvej in chami, yic sk'och telan in nivanil svay t'a cal k’ik’ k’inal.
Ha nok' ha'ay yet' campusante svaloch in mam in nunoc yet' vanab'oc.
¿B'ajtil ay tas svak'och yipoc in k'ool? ¿Ay am mach ojtannac tas ol in ajoc?
¿Tom ol k'och jun chi' ved' t'a yet'tal eb' chamnac? ¿Tom ol cannhej ved' ta' t'a yol lum lum chi'? xchi winhaj Job chi'.
